data.title: List of 10 Beautiful Countries Where Indian Currency is Higher
data.meta_description: Planning to travel on a tight budget? Here’s a list of 10 countries where Indian currency have a higher value.
data.text:
Is your tight budget crushing your dream to travel across the globe?

We understand how travelling to most foreign countries can hit your wallet due to the declining rupee value. But did you know there are countries where Indian rupee is stronger. Not just this, these global destinations are also the places, but also where you can enjoy a refreshing short vacay with your family.

Whether you are a student living on fundings or a working professional with a neck-to-neck budget— , you can relish the taste of travelling one piece at a time! Here is a list of 10 beautiful countries you can visit on a shoestring budget!

10 Countries Where the Value Of the Indian Rupee Is High

Certain countries do not require you to have a fortune in your pocket. All you have to do is pack lighter, research the economic destinations well, and fly off to the destination with international travel insurance to safeguard you amid an emergency! Here is the list of 10 countries where inr is stronger:

Sri Lanka

Home to lush greenery, pristine beaches and great historical monuments, Sri Lanka is one country where Indian rupee holds a higher value. If you are a lover of beautiful sceneries and wish to have fun and leisure at the same time, Sri Lanka is the destination where you should be.

₹1= 3.89 Sri Lankan Rupee

Indonesia

The tropical climate, clear blue waters, scenic greenery, and a free visa on arrival and all of that while feeling prosperous! What more does an Indian want to embark on a memorable vacation? If a vacation full of leisure is what you crave, Indonesia is just a 5 hours direct flight away!

₹1= 184.12 rupiah

Vietnam

Vietnam is another country where INR is stronger and thus, you can visit on a shoestring budget. Vietnam is just a 4 to 5 hours flight from India, offering sumptuous cuisine, beautiful Buddhist pagodas, pristine blue beaches, french architecture, and war museums, among other picturesque sightseeing options. .

₹1= 289.54 Vietnamese Dong

Nepal

A trip to Nepal can be your escape plan if your budget blocks you from travelling! Apart from being home to the breathtaking Mount Everest, Nepal embraces diverse cultures and delightful traditions. What adds cherry to the cake is our neighbouring country’s pocket-friendly tourism and visa-free entry to Indian nationals.

₹1= 1.60 Nepalese Rupee

Cambodia

Cambodia is yet another destination that Indian nationals can visit without breaking the bank! If you love exploring historical places, national museums, and archaeological ruins, then Cambodia is an economical place to start from.

₹1= 50.05 Cambodian riel

Japan

Japan is one of the most technologically ahead countries in the world. But that doesn’t mean you can’t visit the country and relish the taste of sushi in the land! Japan is yet another economic country you can visit from India. It won’t be wrong to say that “some of the best things come priceless!”

₹1= 1.77 Japanese Yen

Hungary

Royal architecture, friendly people, relaxing spa, excellent wines, and mesmerising nightlife —Hungary is a place that offers all these things and more! If you plan to visit the country, May, June, September, and Early October are the best times for Indians to enjoy Hungarian hospitality on a low budget.

₹1= 4.35 Hungarian Forint

South Korea

South Korea is everything North Korea is not. From breathtaking views and cherry trees to high-tech cities, everything makes the country worth a visit. Although you must apply for a visa to visit South Korea, you do not need a huge fortune to visit the country.

₹1= 16.03 South Korean Won

Costa Rica

A country in the Central American region, Costa Rica is one of the most beautiful destinations to witness thrilling wildlife, waterfalls and beaches. Apart from being a beautiful destination, Costa Rica is also a country where having an Indian rupee can make you feel richer.

₹1= 6.47 Costa Rican Colon

Paraguay

If Argentina and Brazil seem too far off, you can try visiting Paraguay as an offbeat destination. We recommend you visit Paraguay if you like to explore the untouched scenic beauty, such as mesmerising falls, dense forests, and local rural handicrafts.

Paraguay is a country where the Indian rupee has a high value thus, you do not have to loot the bank to enjoy a vacation in the country.

₹1= 87.63 Paraguayan Guarani

Summing It Up

The above-mentioned is a list of ten countries where the Indian currency has a higher value. You can simply pack your bags and embark on a journey. However, you should always plan ahead of time to save yourself from any unforeseen incidents that may catch you off guard. . Thus, we suggest you safeguard your trip with a comprehensive international travel insurance plan.

Pro tip: If you plan to visit multiple destinations within a single year, you should secure all your trips with a comprehensive multi-trip travel insurance plan by Care Health Insurance. Our travel insurance offer superior benefits and unique advantages to travellers that you can go through while booking the policy.

What are you waiting for? Check out the plan’s coverage now!
